description_bullets: Engineered a scalable real-time stock market analytics platform using React, Flask, PostgreSQL, and AWS to support live data processing
Integrated financial APIs and WebSocket streams to deliver market updates with sub-second latency and dynamic chart visualizations
Optimized backend performance with asynchronous processing and query caching, reducing load time by 40% and boosting user engagement by 200+ daily users
Developed a B-Tree file management system in C++ to efficiently store and retrieve musical instrument records with dynamic indexing and delimiter-based organization
Implemented CRUD operations with variable-length fields and primary key indexing, significantly reducing access time for data lookup and modification
Conducted comprehensive unit and integration testing to validate system correctness, performance, and reliability
Engineered an automated course scheduling tool using Python, Pandas, and SQLite to optimize academic timetables
Implemented constraint satisfaction algorithms including backtracking and greedy heuristics to ensure conflict-free scheduling
Developed a Streamlit web interface that enhanced user interaction and reduced manual errors by 95% for over 500 students
Engineered a Machine Learning–based Intrusion Detection System using Python, Scikit-learn, and Pandas to enhance cybersecurity monitoring
Optimized a Random Forest classifier achieving 98.5% accuracy and reduced false positives by 20% through advanced feature engineering
Delivered a deployable lightweight IDS prototype integrated into real-time security monitoring pipelines
Developed a real-time stock analytics platform using React, Flask, and PostgreSQL, integrating multiple market APIs to deliver live chart updates with sub-second latency
Engineered user authentication and collaborative watchlist features, enabling shared data tracking and enhancing user engagement across the platform
Deployed the application on AWS EC2 with load balancing, achieving 99.9% uptime and supporting over 200 daily active users

projects.project_name: Music Instrument Management System Using B-Tree Indexing
description_bullets: Engineered a file-based music instrument management system leveraging B-Tree indexing to enhance data retrieval and modification efficiency
Implemented CRUD operations and primary indexing in C++ with delimiter-based variable-length records for optimized memory management and search performance
Conducted comprehensive testing and debugging to ensure robust file operations and system reliability
Engineered an AI-driven course scheduling system using Python, SQLite, and Streamlit to automate academic planning for university students
Optimized scheduling efficiency by implementing constraint satisfaction and optimization algorithms, resolving course conflicts seamlessly
Delivered personalized semester plans through an intuitive web interface, boosting planning accuracy by 95% and enabling instant schedule visualization

projects.project_name: Machine Learning-Based Network Intrusion Detection System (IDS)
description_bullets: Engineered a supervised machine learning model using Scikit-learn and Pandas to classify network intrusions with 98.5% accuracy on benchmark datasets.
Optimized feature selection to decrease false positives by 20% and enhance inference speed for real-time monitoring.
Deployed a real-time intrusion detection system pipeline for live network traffic analysis and security monitoring.
